signatures.name: update
signatures.description: Add a single update document to the bulk operation

signatures.name: updateOne
signatures.description: Add a single update one document to the bulk operation

signatures.name: replaceOne
signatures.description: Add a replace one operation to the bulk operation

signatures.name: upsert
signatures.description: Upsert modifier for update bulk operation

signatures.name: removeOne
signatures.description: Add a remove one operation to the bulk operation

signatures.name: remove
signatures.description: Add a remove operation to the bulk operation

signatures.name: insert
signatures.description: Add a single insert document to the bulk operation

signatures.name: find
signatures.description: Initiate a find operation for an update/updateOne/remove/removeOne/replaceOne

parameters.name: selector
parameters.description: The selector for the bulk operation.

signatures.name: execute
signatures.description: Execute the ordered bulk operation

signatures.name: ok
signatures.description: Did bulk operation correctly execute

signatures.name: nInserted
signatures.description: Number of inserted documents

signatures.name: nUpserted
signatures.description: Number of upserted documents

signatures.name: nMatched
signatures.description: Number of matched documents

signatures.name: nModified
signatures.description: Number of modified documents

signatures.name: nRemoved
signatures.description: Number of removed documents

signatures.name: getInsertedIds
signatures.description: Return an array of inserted ids

signatures.name: getUpsertedIds
signatures.description: Return an array of upserted ids

signatures.name: getUpsertedIdAtn
signatures.description: Return the upserted id at position x

parameters.name: index
parameters.description: the number of the upserted id to return, returns undefined if no result for passed in index

signatures.name: getRawResponse
signatures.description: Return raw internal result

signatures.name: hasWriteErrors
signatures.description: Returns true if the bulk operation contains a write error

signatures.name: getWriteErrorCount
signatures.description: Returns the number of write errors off the bulk operation

signatures.name: getWriteErrorAt
signatures.description: Returns a specific write error object

signatures.name: getWriteErrors
signatures.description: Retrieve all write errors

signatures.name: getLastOp
signatures.description: Retrieve lastOp if available

signatures.name: getWriteConcernError
signatures.description: Retrieve the write concern error if any
